title: Pencil Cup Holder Desk Organizer, Gold Pen Pot Pen Holder Container Desktop Stationery Organizer Table Vases Flower Pot Makeup Brush Holder,Stainless Steel,Gold
features: Material: Made of stainless steel with gold electroplating. The surface outside is mirror finish and very smooth. The bottom inside is mirror surface.
Durable: Crafted from 1.2mm thick stainless steel. The pencil holder is more tough and durable. It definitely can last for years without rusting.
Multipurpose: Our pencil holder is perfect for organizes pencils, pens, highlighters, rulers, markers, scissors and more. It can also be used to hold your makeup brush and other beauty tools.
Modern design: Round simple luxury design metal pen holder,it is great for most of desk or home decor. Perfect for reorganize your desk, counter, dresser, or tabletop at home or in the office.
Space-saving: The pencil cup is compact and do not take up much space. The size and style make this can work both in home and office. It will take up less space of your room.
description: Our pen holder is made of stainless steel with gold electroplating. Surface is plated with fashion shining golden color, very special and beautiful.  Except for hold your stationery like pen or pencil, it can also be used as a vase! The vases can accent your home or office for the decor with dried or silk flowers, branches, wheat and etc. What’s more, you also can use it to storage makeup brush or makeup tools. The design is very modern and unique! Round shape design and gorgeous color make your desk more fashion. It is perfect for office or home decor, dinner parties, holidays, wedding planning and other special occasions. Mirror surface inside the bottom make it especially unique with other pencil holder. It will be a perfect desk helper! Keep your pen and stationery organized well, no mess on the desk. Ideal for home and office use, get your desk well-organized for saving more space. It is for sure that the pen holder can be uses for several years due to the high quality brass. The surface feel smooth and delicate, It may dotted with little hand print, but just a small wipe can make it clean. When cleaning, don't use hard objects to prevent scratches, please scrub it with a soft wet cloth.
For different computer monitors, the color of the actual item may vary slightly from the above images, thanks for your understanding.
